backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining sports types, predictions, user profiles, subscriptions, referrals, and persistent state with access control helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to modified frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variable definitions establishing light and dark mode color tokens for the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, wraps app in AppLayout and ThemeProvider, and defines all page routes including support and terms.
frontend/src/components/AccountProfileEd: Profile editing card allowing users to update name and email with validation and backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/AdminGate.tsx: Gate component that checks admin status and shows loading or access denied screens when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer with navigation links, social icons, and attribution, styled with cash‑themed accents.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Navigation header with links, auth-based items, mobile menu, and login button.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Wraps pages with header/footer and shows a profile setup modal when a logged‑in user lacks a profile.
frontend/src/components/DabbleFormatCard: Displays a formatted betting summary for a prediction and provides copy‑to‑clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/components/HeroBranding.tsx: Hero section with branding graphics, headline, and description for the landing page.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles login/logout via Internet Identity and updates query state accordingly.
frontend/src/components/PredictionsFilte: Filter controls for selecting sport and sort order on predictions pages.
frontend/src/components/PremiumGate.tsx: Gates premium content based on authentication and subscription status, showing CTAs or previews.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter name and optional email to create their profile.
frontend/src/components/RedeemReferralCo: Card for entering and submitting referral codes, with error handling and success messaging.
frontend/src/components/ReferralCodesAdm: Admin UI for creating, listing, copying, and revoking referral codes with duration input and async mutations.
frontend/src/components/ResponsibleGambl: Displays a disclaimer warning about betting risks and accuracy limitations of predictions.
frontend/src/components/StripePaymentSet: Form interface for saving Stripe secret key and allowed countries via a backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/SubscribeCta.tsx: Promotional CTA encouraging users to view pricing and subscribe to premium prediction features.
frontend/src/components/TermsAcceptanceG: Gate component that blocks content until users accept Terms of Service, storing acceptance and handling navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing access control and refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides admin-related queries and mutations for setting data fields and creating predictions using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, loading identities, and handling login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch predictions, including all predictions, by sport, and by ID using an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useReferralCodes.ts: Defines React Query hooks for admins to manage referral codes and for users to redeem them, with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeCheckout.ts: Implements hooks to create Stripe checkout sessions, check Stripe configuration, and update Stripe settings via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubscription.ts: Fetches subscription and referral status, computes active access, and exposes loading and status fields.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and update the caller’s user profile with cache refreshing.
frontend/src/index.css: Global TailwindCSS configuration defining themes, color tokens, gradients, and utility classes for styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that initializes React, sets up the QueryClient, and wraps the app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Account page showing profile data, principal ID, subscription and referral status, with loading and auth handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin interface for Stripe setup and managing depth charts, injuries, coaching styles, news flags, and predictions using various mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page showing branding, feature highlights, and pricing preview for CashPicks. Uses cards and icons to present service benefits and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment failure message with options to retry subscribing or return home. Provides simple navigation and status indication.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Shows confirmation of a successful subscription payment and offers navigation to predictions or account. Triggers a toast notification on load.
Fetches and displays detailed prediction info including sport, market, confidence, and risk tier. Handles loading, errors, and gated premium content.
frontend/src/pages/PredictionsPage.tsx: Lists all predictions with filtering, sorting, and risk indicators. Handles data loading states and integrates premium and terms gates.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Shows monthly and yearly subscription plans and handles Stripe checkout creation after validating authentication and terms acceptance.
frontend/src/pages/SendSupportPage.tsx: Displays Cash App support information with copy-to-clipboard functionality and external link to Cash App profile. Encourages user donations.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders the Terms of Service page with scrollable legal text, tracks acceptance via state, and saves acceptance to localStorage with toast notifications.
frontend/src/utils/riskTier.ts: Converts a prediction's winningProbability into a labeled risk tier with associated colors and descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/termsAcceptance.ts: Provides helpers to read, write, and clear a terms-acceptance flag in localStorage with timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, container settings, animations, and custom cash-themed variables.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s state, requirements, existing features, and architectural notes for the sports predictions app.
